text: The Great Mouse Detective is a 1986 American animated movie. It was produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation. It was first released to movie theaters in the United States on July 2, 1986 and co-produced with Walt Disney Pictures. It is the 26th animated movie in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series. The main characters are all mice (except Ratigan, who is a rat) living in Victorian London. The Great Mouse Detective was the first Disney animated movie to be released under Disney's current animation studio Walt Disney Feature Animation. The movie is based on the children's book series Basil of Baker Street by Eve Titus. It is also similar to the stories about Sherlock Holmes. ==References== == Other websites == * * (Dead link) * Category:1986 movies Category:1986 animated movies Category:1980s family movies Category:1986 mystery movies Category:American family comedy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies about mice Category:Disney animated movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies about royalty Category:Movies about children Category:Movies about abduction Category:American children's adventure movies Category:1986 adventure movies Category:Adventure comedy movies Category:Movies about friendship Category:Movies set in the 1890s
title: The Great Mouse Detective
